Package moxie.hamcrest

This package contains Hamcrest matchers and related classes used internally by Moxie (though you're welcome to use them in your tests as well).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IsArray<T>
    Matches any array (including primitive arrays) where each element of the array satisfies the corresponding Matcher in a sequence of Matchers, and with the same number of elements as the sequence of Matchers.
    IsArrayContaining<T>
    Matches any array (including primitive arrays) where any element satisfies a nested Matcher.
    IsArrayWithSize<T>
    Matches any array (including primitive arrays) whose size satisfies a nested Matcher.
    IsCloseTo<T extends Number>
    Matches any Number whose doubleValue() is equal to a desired value to within an acceptable tolerance.
    IsCollectionWithSize<T extends Collection>
    Matches any Collection whose size satisfies a nested Matcher.
    IsInstanceOfArray<T>
    Matches any array (including primitive arrays).
    IsMapWithSize<T extends Map>
    Matches any Map whose size satisfies a nested Matcher.
    LambdaMatcher<T>
    Adapter that lets you quickly specify a custom Matcher using Java 8 lambda syntax.
    MatchesRegexp<T>
    Matches any object whose string representation (as returned by the toString() method) matches a provided regular expression.
    SimpleDescription
    Provides a simple implementation of the Description interface backed by a StringBuilder.

Package moxie.hamcrest Description

This package contains Hamcrest matchers and related classes used internally by Moxie (though you're welcome to use them in your tests as well).
